venue.address_2: Corner of Dartmouth St. & Comm Ave.
venue.name: BarLola Tapas Lounge

item.description:
We're meeting up for our Valentine's Day Happy Hour at Bar Lola, located on the corner of Dartmouth and Commonwealth Aves. Come and join us for great drinks, tapas and a fabulous time! I'll be there by 6pm wearing the big pink heart.

BarLola Lounge
160 Commonwealth Ave
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 266-1122

Start 6pm - ???????
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a big red heart on my chest... Seriously!
item.why:
1. We're celebrating the love of good people, cocktails, and tapas!
2. Because Valentine's has nothing to do with bad dates, random hook-ups and listening to silly pick-up lines.
3. It's Thursday, so one day before the weekend.
item.name: Valentine's Day Meetup at Bar Lola
